PERSONAL QUALITIES I am attentive, focused, diligent, and have good analytical skills. Quickly, efficiently and most importantly, I solve the tasks in time. The ability to work with a high degree of load, which indicates the stressability and speed of work. Responsible, decent, focused on the final result and achievement of the goal. Sociable, sincere, easy to establish contact with people. I appreciate trusting relationships in the team and consider this the Foundation of a strong team.

MOTIVATION AND self- DEVELOPMENT are the most important characteristics for me , so I do not stop there and study different technologies and not only. The knowledge and skills written below were studied by me on my own. My goal is to be a professional and in- demand specialist, to bring benefits by working with maximum efficiency.
